title: Miley Cyrus cuddles up to topless Cody Simpson after hospital stint
text:
This couple love a good selfie (Picture: Miley Cyrus, Instagram)

Miley Cyrus got a warm welcome when she returned home from the hospital this week, with her boyfriend Cody Simpson on-hand to smother her with affection.

The We Can’t Stop singer spent a few days in hospital receiving treatment for a nasty throat infection but was fortunately released on Wednesday.

Of course, it didn’t take long for Miley, 26, to pose for yet another cosy selfie with her new boyfriend for the ‘gram.

In fact, it was only a matter of hours before they were cuddling up in the bathroom to take a mirror selfie. Miley is seen wrapping her arms around the Australian swimmer as he stands topless, taking the snap.

Miley captioned the cute image: ‘Recovering from surgery and send all the vibes.’

Cody shared another selfie of the pair together and another photo of Miley alongside the captions: ‘We are 4’ and ‘She made it home… My sick girl is finally free.’

During Miley’s hospital stay, Cody proved to be the most doting boyfriend and even serenaded her with a romantic song at her bed.

Miley and Cody reunited (Picture: Miley Cyrus, Instagram)

Miley was released from hospital on Wednesday (Picture: Cody Simpson)

‘Singing something I wrote for my golden thing while she’s sick in hospital #goldenthing,’ Cody said.

Miley seemed to confirm they were an official couple when she referred to Cody as her boyfriend, telling her Instagram followers: ‘BF coming to visit me @ the hospy [sic].’

The Wrecking Ball star was also visited by her mother Tish Cyrus while in hospital for tonsillitis. Alongside a photo with her beloved mum, Miley said: ‘How you present yourself can determine how you feel! Thank you mama for helpin this little sickyyy look a little bit better by brushing my hair for me… mommy’s are the best! [sic].’

Miley went public with her relationship with Cody just two weeks after her split from girlfriend Kaitlynn Carter was revealed.

The pair had dated for two months following Miley’s split from husband Liam Hemsworth, and not long after the end of Kaitlynn’s marriage to Brody Jenner.
